A1.descr_env: surface of members in contact with the ground: members protected by a damp-proof membrane and residential footings in non aggressive soils;Surfaces of members in interior environments: fully enclosed within a building except for a brief period of weather during construction; residential A1; Surfaces of members in abov-ground exterior environments in areas that are (a) inland (more than 50  km); non industrial and arid climatic zone A1);

A2.descr_env: surface of members in contact with the ground: other members in non aggressive soils A2; Surfaces of members in interior environments: fully enclosed within a building except for a brief period of weather during construction non residential A2; Surfaces of members in abov-ground exterior environments in areas that are: non industrial and temperate climatic zone (A2);

B1.descr_env: Surfaces of members in interior environments: (b) in industrial buildings, the member being subject to repeated wetting and drying B1; Surfaces of members in abov-ground exterior environments in areas that are industrial and any climatic zone B1, near coastal (1-50 km) any climatic zone B1, Surfaces of members in water in freshwater (continuously) B1

B2.descr_env: Surfaces of members in abov-ground exterior environments in areas that are: coastal and any climatic zone B2, Surfaces of maritime structures in sea water: permanently submerged B2

C1.descr_env: Surfaces of maritime structures in sea water in spray zone C1

C2.descr_env: Surfaces of maritime structures in sea water in tidal/splash zone C2

U.descr_env: Surface of members in other environments, that is, any exposure environment not specified in items 1 to 5 above U
